item.title: Stepping Back
item.description: Hiya folks, just a quick post from me today :) After over a year of daily(-ish) contributions, I just want to let folks know I’m going to be taking a step back from contributing to Kubernetes. Once this diff is merged, I won’t be a reviewer for sig-node anymore. Additionally, with the KEP for Building Kubelet Without Docker complete, my major projects are all wrapped up, and I doubt I’ll be picking up new ones.
